title: A humble suggestion on Google Pixel 4a 5G
content: First things first, I love small phones that are handy for single hand use. The dimensional specifications of Google Pixel 4a is just perfect for people like me who love using small phones. The current phone that I'm using is small to. I look forward to owning a pixel phone and I'm someone who uses a phone for a decent 3-4 years. With this criteria in mind, I look forward for Google Pixel 4a 5G in India soon. Greater storage, processing speed with simple single camera setup would be a add on if you can manage to do it.
